name.description: ReadOnly, Gets the name for the error

statusCode.description: ReadOnly, Gets the status code for the error.

message.description: ReadOnly, Gets the message for the error

innerErrorMessage.description: ReadOnly, Gets the message for the inner error

innerErrorName.description: ReadOnly, Gets the name for the inner error

innerErrorStack.description: ReadOnly, Gets the server call stack for the inner error.
